languages.text: Ересь на Кьяве Гамма была разгромлена, но не искоренена до последнего отравленного семени. Мануфакторумы планеты слишком важны, чтобы вмешиваться в их непрерывный цикл производства.

Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.
languages.original_text: Ересь на Кьяве Гамма была разгромлена, но не искоренена до последнего отравленного семени. Мануфакторумы планеты слишком важны, чтобы вмешиваться в их непрерывный цикл производства.

traits.locale_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been brought down but not eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.
Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been brought down but not eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

languages.text: La herejía en Kiava Gamma está contenida, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no cejará hasta erradicar la última semilla de blasfemia. Sin embargo, los manufactorums del planeta son demasiado importantes como para permitir cualquier interrupción de su sagrado ciclo de producción.
languages.original_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

traits.locale_text: La herejía en Kiava Gamma está contenida, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no cejará hasta erradicar la última semilla de blasfemia. Sin embargo, los manufactorums del planeta son demasiado importantes como para permitir cualquier interrupción de su sagrado ciclo de producción.

languages.text: Si l'influence des éléments hérétiques qui sévissaient sur Kiava Gamma a été grandement réduite, {mf|le libre-marchand est déterminé|la libre-marchande est déterminée} à éradiquer jusqu'à la plus infime trace de corruption. Les manufactorums de la planète sont bien trop importants pour laisser le moindre grain de sable entraver leur bonne marche.
languages.original_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

traits.locale_text: Si l'influence des éléments hérétiques qui sévissaient sur Kiava Gamma a été grandement réduite, {mf|le libre-marchand est déterminé|la libre-marchande est déterminée} à éradiquer jusqu'à la plus infime trace de corruption. Les manufactorums de la planète sont bien trop importants pour laisser le moindre grain de sable entraver leur bonne marche.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星的异端势力已被大为削弱，但行商浪人绝不会善罢甘休，势必要掘出最后一粒有毒的种子。然而，这颗行星上的制造工厂实在太过重要，无论发生什么事情，都绝对不能停工。
languages.original_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星的异端势力已被大为削弱，但行商浪人绝不会善罢甘休，势必要掘出最后一粒有毒的种子。然而，这颗行星上的制造工厂实在太过重要，无论发生什么事情，都绝对不能停工。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマの異端の数は減少したが、ローグトレーダーはその毒を根絶するまで休むつもりはない。惑星の聖工場は非常に重要なものであり、生産サイクルの中断は許されないのだ。
languages.original_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマの異端の数は減少したが、ローグトレーダーはその毒を根絶するまで休むつもりはない。惑星の聖工場は非常に重要なものであり、生産サイクルの中断は許されないのだ。

languages.text: Die Ketzerei auf Kiava Gamma wurde eingedämmt, doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} wird nicht eher ruhen, als bis sie vollkommen ausgerottet ist, bis zum letzten vergifteten Keim. Die Manufactorien des Planeten sind zu wichtig, um eine Unterbrechung ihres unaufhörlichen Produktionszyklus zuzulassen.
languages.original_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.

traits.locale_text: Die Ketzterei auf Kiava Gamma wurde eingedämmt, doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} wird nicht eher ruhen, als bis sie vollkommen ausgerottet ist, bis zum letzten vergifteten Keim. Die Manufactorien des Planeten sind zu wichtig, um eine Unterbrechung ihres unaufhörlichen Produktionszyklus zuzulassen.

languages.text: Kiava Gama'daki kâfirliğin kolu bacağı kesildi ancak zehir saçan son tohum da imha edilene dek Hür Tacir'in dinlenmeye niyeti yok. Gezegenin manufaktorumları, durmak bilmeyen üretim döngülerinde herhangi bir kesintiye izin verilemeyecek denli mühim.
languages.original_text: Heresy on Kiava Gamma has been curtailed, but the Rogue Trader will not rest until it has been eradicated to the last poisoned seed. The planet's manufactorums are too important to allow any interruptions in their ceaseless production cycle.
